welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Groveton, a charming city known for its beautiful parks, lively music scene, and friendly locals. We hope you enjoy your stay and take the time to explore all that our wonderful city has to offer!"

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Ronald Reagan Washington National Airport, also known as Terminal A, serves all airlines and provides access to all airport facilities.

terminals.name: Terminal B
terminals.description: Terminal B serves American Airlines and its regional partners, as well as some international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal C
terminals.description: Terminal C serves Delta Air Lines and its regional partners.

wifi.note: Passengers can connect to the airport's free Wi-Fi network by selecting 'DCA Free Wi-Fi' in their device's network settings.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Washington Dulles International Airport serves as the hub for all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Concourse A
terminals.description: Concourse A primarily serves international flights and is home to several airlines, including United Airlines and Lufthansa.

terminals.name: Concourse B
terminals.description: Concourse B is the largest concourse at Washington Dulles International Airport and serves a variety of domestic and international airlines.

terminals.name: Concourse C
terminals.description: Concourse C is the newest concourse at Washington Dulles International Airport and is primarily used for domestic flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Tipton AAF Airport serves as the primary hub for all commercial and military flights.

terminals.name: Military Terminal
terminals.description: The military terminal at Tipton AAF Airport is used exclusively for military personnel and their families.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Montgomery County Airport serves both commercial and private flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Montgomery County Airport caters to private and chartered flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
